edu.colorado.cs.ngn.lime.migration

Class LimeMigrationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.colorado.cs.ngn.lime.migration.LimeMigrationHandler

  • public final class LimeMigrationHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Murad Kaplan, Michael Coughlin Class to handle migration of a network. Is a singleton object so that api calls to start migration cannot accidentally start migration twice.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static LimeMigrationHandler getInstance()

      • init

        public void init()
          throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                 LimeDummyPortNotFoundException
        Starts the migration process. This method is called before VMs are migrated.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        LimeDummyPortNotFoundException

      • migrateVM

        public boolean migrateVM(LimeHost host)
                  throws LimeDummyPortNotFoundException
        This functions uses libvirt to migrate a VM. The flowvisor user will need to have access rights for libvirt on the source and destination hypervisors that are specified in the host config, and password-less ssh login be pre-sharing ssh-keys to all hypervisors.
        Throws:
        LimeDummyPortNotFoundException

      • switchDoneMigrating

        public void switchDoneMigrating(DPID activeSwitchDpid)
        Signal that a particular switch is done migrating. Deletes all migration mods from the original switch and ensures that all of the original flow mods are written to the clone switch
        Parameters:
        activeSwitchDpid - The switch that has finished migrating

      • isMigrating

        public boolean isMigrating()
        Check if the migration flag has been set
        Returns:
        The state of the migration flag

      • createVlanHandlers

        public LimeVlanTranslationInfo createVlanHandlers(FVFlowMod originalMod,
                                         DPID receiverSwitch,
                                         DPID senderSwitch,
                                         boolean originalToClone,
                                         boolean preMigration,
                                         short preMigrationPort)
                                           throws LimeDummyPortNotFoundException
        Record a flow mod in the migration handler data structure that creates a vlan handler mod and a vlan handler mod. This stores information about the current migration mod, including the associated switches and ports and the direction.
        Parameters:
        originalMod - The orginal flow mod
        receiverSwitch - The switch that receives the recevier mod
        senderSwitch - The switch that receives the sender mod
        originalToClone - The direction of the migration mods. True if the receiver switch is a clone switch and the sender switch is an original switch, false otherwise
        preMigration - True is this migration mod is occurring immediately before a VM migration
        preMigrationPort - The port number of the VM that is about to be migrated. If preMigration is false then this input has no meaning
        Returns:
        A new LimeVlanTranslationInfo object that stores the input state associated with a migration mod
        Throws:
        LimeDummyPortNotFoundException
